column1: '''''J.R.R. Tolkien's''''' '''The Silmarillion''' is a [[1999]] booklet about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Silmarillion]]'', in the series ''Babel handbooks on fantasy and SF writers'' (no. 10).
A revised version of the text appeared in [[The Silmarillion: Thirty Years On
column2: The Silmarillion: ''Thirty Years On'']] (2010).<ref>[http://www.walking-tree.org/cormareBookInfo.php?number=15 The Silmarillion: 30 years on] at [http://www.walking-tree.org/ Walking Tree Publishers] (accessed 15 May 2011)</ref>
